resources.string:
Our pledges have been heard!
help us, powerfull finger, to save
the forest from corrupted the animals 
who try to destroy our home
This is your end! You will not pass. \nPray all you can because \nyou will need help. ¡Hahahaha!.

Thanks, but we need to hurry up,
lthe Corruption its spreading to sea.
¡Hurry! There is no time
to lose!.

You may have deafeted Sachiel,
 but you wont be so lucky 
 with me. Soon you will have no finger
 to fight.
Thank you again... for defeating the \nguardians. ¡Now, the whole world \nwill be under my control! Bwahahahahaha.
In the end you came to me, awesome. \nBut I hope you brought some water \nbecause I will reduce your finger to ashes!.
This is not over yet. Darkness live in everybodys heart. And when you let your guard down.... I will be there waiting.
Do you like the app? Please, vote and post about our game to help us:
Sorry for the inconvenience of the ads, but thanks to them we can continue to create more games.
Connect to access the achievement system! where you will get emblems in different game modes. You can also compete in the global ranking so classic! and many more things! connects it now!
Thank you very much for helping.
